extensionDescription.message: Protect browsers from accessing untrusted websites.

extensionTagline.message: A browser extension for the paranoid.

untrustedDomainDesc.message: A request to this URL was blocked because the domain or subdomian is not trusted.

checkTrustSubdomains.message: Check the "Trust Subdomains" checkbox by default.

removeWwwDesc.message: Remove "www." from domains before trusting them and ignore "www" subdomains such that trusting "example.com" also trusts "www.example.com".

tempTrustDurationDesc.message: The duration to temporarily trust domains if the "Temporarily trust and continue" button is clicked.

tempTrustDefaultDesc.message: All settings will use the "Temporary trust default duration" setting by default (e.g. "Never" won't be selected by default).

importTrustedDomainsDesc.message: Import trusted domains from a file.

exportTrustedDomainsDesc.message: Export trusted domains to a file.

resetTrustedDomainsDesc.message: Remove all trusted domains and add default trusted domains (if any).

resetSettingsDesc.message: Reset all settings to default (excluding trusted domains).

domainIsBrowser.message: This is a secure browser page.

domainTrustedBuRule.message: Domain is trusted by this rule:
